classType: Party Buff - Crit Rate + Crit Damage

pros: Has lifesteal from Quiver Cartridge's Blood Arrows
Hookshot allows you to freely move around the map
Sharp Eyes provides %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage to party members
Gains %Final Damage based on an enemy's PDR from Armor Break
Has many useful summons such as Phoenix, Arrow Blaster, and Guided Arrow
cons: Requires a lot of skill rotations for optimal damage and skill uptime

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Reckless Hunt: Bow's %DEF reduction, Focus Fury Abnormal Status Resistance buff, Armor Break's Final Damage boost, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Dodge Chance: +30%
Final Damage: +(40% when Reckless Hunt: Bow is active)

buffInfo.active: , , (Toggle), , , (Toggle)
buffInfo.summons: , (120 - 105s cd), (60s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (57 - 30s cd), (90s cd), (120s cd), (120s cd), (30s cd), (150s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (120s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Archer to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Bowman, long-ranged and controlled' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Bowman, talk to Athena Pierce to accept a quest called 'Trail of the Hunter'. Completing the quest will make you a Hunter and you will be on the path to a Bowmaster. Hunter is the 2nd job of Bowmaster

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Sharp Eyes - Guardbreak
  • Arrow Stream - Extra Strike
  • Hurricane - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Split Attack

credits: Pros and Cons + Hyper Passive Build

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Arrow Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 295%, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Shoots an arrow that when hit, damages nearby enemies

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, double-tapping the Up Arrow Key will perform a vertical jump
Double-tapping the Down Arrow Key will allow you to descend quickly

primary.name: Critical Shot
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Archery Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Range +120, Movement Speed +30, Max Movement Speed Increased to 160

primary.name: Arrow Bomb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 525%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Stun Duration: 6 sec, Stun Chance: 60%
primary.desc: Shoots an explosive arrow that when hit, explodes damaging nearby enemies
details: Attack has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Covering Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, if you press and hold the skill key after jumping a certain distance backward, you will attack enemies at up to 105% of damage for 2 sec while in mid-air
primary.desc: Leaps backwards into the air and fires a stream of arrows

primary.name: Bow Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Bow Attack Speed increased for 300 sec
primary.desc: Increases your Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Soul Arrow: Bow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Attack Power: +30, Duration: 300 sec, able to attack without using arrows

primary.name: Quiver Cartridge
primary.shortDesc:
Fires 1 arrow out of 10 from a quiver containing three specialized arrows. The quiver refills when all three arrows have been expended.
Blood Arrowhead: Has a 50% chance to restore 3% of Max HP
Poison Arrowhead: Deals 150% damage over 8 sec, and can stack up to 3 times. When attacking an enemy with Poison Arrow's DoT applied, Critical Damage is increased by 4%.
Magic Arrowhead: Has a 30% chance to fire a magic arrow that deals 220% damage.
primary.desc: While active, your attacks fire special homing arrows. There are 3 different quiver types, once you've consumed one quiver, you automatically switch to the next
details: Pressing the Skill Key will manually switch to the next quiver

The 3 types of quivers are:
  • [Blood Arrow]: Attack has a chance to restore some %Max HP
  • [Posion Arrow]: Attack has a chance to inflict a stacking damaging debuff
  • [Magic Arrow]: Attack has a chance to shoot a special magic arrow

primary.name: Bow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Final Attack : Bow
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 150% Final Attack damage.
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Arrow Blaster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 181%. While casting, use the Interact/Harvest key to set up Arrow Blaster, firing arrows that deal 85% damage for 30 sec.\nCooldown for installed Arrow Blaster: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Fires a stream of arrows at a chosen angle
details: You can use the Up and Down Arrow Keys to change the angle of firing

While casting, pressing the 'Interact / Harvest' key will set up an Arrow Blaster at your location
  • You can change the key to the Attack Key instead by right-clicking the skill
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect
  • Has a cooldown (5 secs) before another Arrow Blaster can be placed (only 1 active at a time)

primary.name: Flame Surge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage Over Time: 100% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that releases a fiery attack upon hitting an enemy, leaving a lingering burning field

primary.name: Phoenix
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, summon Phoenix for 220 sec. Attack up to 4 enemies at once with 390% damage. 95% chance to Stun\n[Passive Effects: Increase Defense by 30%]
primary.desc: Summons a Phoenix that fights alongside you
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Permanently increases %DEF

primary.name: Hookshot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, after attacking with 170% damage, moves by passing through enemies\n[Passive Effects: Max HP increases by 40%]
primary.desc: Fires a hook that targets the furthest enemy in range and pulls you towards it
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Max HP

primary.name: Reckless Hunt: Bow
primary.shortDesc: DEF: -25%, Attack Power: +40, Final Damage: +30%
primary.desc: While active, reduces %DEF but increases %Final Damage and grants flat Attack

primary.name: Mortal Blow
primary.shortDesc: After 9 number of attacks, the following attack's damage +80%.

primary.name: Focused Fury
primary.shortDesc: While attacking, Status Resistance will increase by 5 per hit up to 100 for 90 sec. Resets when an Abnormal Status is received.\n[Passive Effects: Increases Status Resistance by 20 and Elemental Resistance by 20%]
primary.desc: While attacking, you periodically gain Abnormal Status Resistance
details: Resets when an Abnormal Status is received
[Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Evasion Boost
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 30%, all attacks following a successful dodge for 1 sec will be criticals.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
details: Whenever you dodge an attack, all your attacks will be Critical Hits briefly

primary.name: Marksmanship
primary.shortDesc: When attacking, ignores 25% of monster's Weapon DEF. Attack Power: +25%

primary.name: Hurricane
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, 350% damage per arrow. While casting, move at 100% speed
primary.desc: While held, fires a continuous flurry of arrows at a single enemy
details: You can move and jump while firing

primary.name: Binding Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 26, Damage: 530%, Number of Attacks: 6, Duration: 20 sec, HP Recovery effect: -60%, Speed: -30%\nCooldown: 10 sec\n[Passive Effects: Increases damage for Arrow blaster and installed Arrow Blaster by 90%]
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that debuffs an enemy
details: [Debuff]: Reduces HP Recover and Movement Speed
[Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of
Has a cooldown (20 - 10 secs depending on Skill Level)

primary.name: Arrow Stream
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, attack up to 8 enemies with 350% damage 5 times
primary.desc: Fires a barrage of arrows forward

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: 20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Enhancted Quiver
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20, Current arrow will not be consumed for 30 sec. Cooldown: 30 sec
[Passive Effects] Blood Arrow - Recovery Chance: 70%, Max HP Recovery Ration: +5%.
Poison Arrow - Damage Over Time: 220%. Critical Damage Increase Rate: +8%
Magic Arrow - Activation Chance: 60%. Damage increases to 260%.
Poison Arrow and Blood Arrow count increased to 20 arrows. Magic Arrow increased to 40 arrows.
primary.desc: Allows you to shoot without consuming your current quiver
details: [Passive] Permanently increases the effects of quivers and the number of arrows carried per quiver

primary.name: Bow Expert
primary.shortDesc: Bow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +60, Critical Damage: +8%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Illusion Step
primary.shortDesc: Dexterity: +80, Avoidability: +30% chance, Damage taken reduced by 20%.

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 70%, Damage: 210%
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Armor Break
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage increases as much as 100% of Enemy DEF while attacking, and 50% of Enemy DEF is ignored.\nCooldown: 9 sec, Cooldown reduced by 1 sec every time you attack. Minimum cooldown of 1 sec.
primary.desc: Periodically increases your next attack's %Final Damage and %Ignore DEF based on the enemy's PDR (Physical Defense Resistance)
details: Cooldown of skill is reduced every time you attack

hyperPassive.name: Hurricane - Split Attack
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Number of Attacks: +1, reduces Damage to 75% of the original Damage

hyperActive.name: Concentrate
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 30 sec, Attack Power: +50, Knockback Resistance: +100%, When Attacking Boss Monsters - Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 90 sec.

hyperActive.name: Gritty Gust
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 335%, Number of Attacks: 12, 200% damage every 10 sec.\nCooldown: 15 sec
hyperActive.desc: Releases a burst of wind that damages nearby enemies and inflicts a damaging debuff

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Storm of Arrows
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Damage: +27%, Duration: 65 sec, arrows rain down every 5 sec for 2.5 sec; up to 6 of these areas can be created.
The falling arrows deal 1200% damage on up to 10 enemies 5 times.
Magic Arrow activation chance applied to attacks in this area is 2x that of Quiver Cartridge.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Damage and arrows periodically rain from the sky on to enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Inhuman Speed
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 800, Duration: 3 sec. Fires arrows at set intervals dealing 800% 3 times to enemies within range of your afterimages.
Cooldown: 30 sec
[Passive Effect: Every 10 attacks performed while this skill is on cooldown, an afterimage is created that lasts 1 sec and periodically attacks enemies within its range for 800% damage 3 times.]
Active and Passive Effects cannot trigger simultaneously.
fifthMain.desc: When first activated, creates an afterimage that attacks alongside you. While the Skill is on cooldown, every 10 attacks, you create another afterimage that attacks alongside you

fifthMain.name: Quiver Barrage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 30 sec, Attack Power: +17%, use every type of arrowhead at once, including a flaming arrowhead\nFlaming Arrow: Launches 6 flaming arrows consecutively at a certain interval. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 3\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases %Attack and uses every quiver at once without consuming them. Additionally, adds another quiver type, Flaming Arrows that explode and damages nearby enemies
details:
Cannot be used together with
  • will be canceled if Quiver Barrage is activated

fifthMain.name: Silhouette Mirage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Creates up to 2 illusory doubles every 50 sec
When you either receive damage that is at least 50% of your Max HP or you receive damage that leads to death, 1 illusory double disappears and that damage reduces by 80%
If you have even 1 illusory double, direct skill attacks that hit will shoot 5 illusory bullets dealing 800% damage 3 times, MP Cost: 80, Cooldown: 7.5 sec
Cooldown: 1.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: When toggled, when you take damage equal to 50% of your max HP or higher or if the attack is fatal, a mirage (if available) will be consumed and the damage taken will be reduced
details: If you have a mirage active, your attacks fire an additional attack periodically
You gain 1 mirage every 45 secs (up to 2 max)
Unaffected by Damage Reflect
Right-clicking the skill will turn the mirage visual effect on/off

meta: Bowmaster is a DEX archer class part of the Explorers class group. Bowmasters take down their enemies from afar using a flurry of arrows and useful summons. When in trouble, they have all the utilities to get out of danger
